text: "Yeah, said Dowd dubiously. "2Mebbe we'd better." Surprisingly Dan Maffrey came in at that point."If you do, he said, "you'll be sure asking for trouble. They'll be on your necks before you can say 'knife'. It wouldn't be the first time they've held up a diggings at gun point either. They've done it before and got away with it."
handwritten_text: "Yeah, said Dowd dubiously. "2Mebbe we'd better." Surprisingly Dan Maffrey came in at that point."If you do, he said, "you'll be sure asking for trouble. They'll be on your necks before you can say 'knife'. It wouldn't be the first time they've held up a diggings at gun point either. They've done it before and got away with it."
